publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3716 Brian Adam: Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to urge Her Majesty’s Government to undertake an inquiry into the amounts of money being generated by broadcasting companies from telephone polling, competitions and quizzes.

S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Fergus Ewing*, Chris Ballance*, Bruce Crawford*, Stewart Stevenson*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Robin Harper*
S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3716 Brian Adam: Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to urge Her Majesty’s Government to undertake an inquiry into the amounts of money being generated by broadcasting companies from telephone polling, competitions and quizzes. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fergus Ewing, Chris Ballance, Bruce Crawford, Stewart Stevenson, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Robin Harper, Shiona Baird, Donald Gorrie
S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-3716 Broadcasting Companies’ Income Generation from Telephone Polling, Competitions and Quizzes (lodged on 12 December 2005) Frances Curran*, Linda Fabiani*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
